snippet.title: Paragon from Epic Games - Gameplay First Look
snippet.description:
Take a first look at gameplay for Paragon, the MOBA from Epic Games, coming to PC and PS4 in 2016. Paragon puts you in the fight with explosive action, direct third-person control, and deep strategic choice. 

The Battle for Agora has begun and it's your turn to Join the Fight. Buy a Founder’s Pack and play today.


Sign up for the beta and learn more at: https://www.Paragon.com
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/paragon
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/paragon

This alpha gameplay footage was captured in-game on PC.
